CustomField.description: The system automatically populates this optional field to indicate a loan's eligibility for Dodd-Frank 1071 compliance reporting. By default, it is empty.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The system automatically populates this optional field to indicate a loan's eligibility for Dodd-Frank 1071 compliance reporting. By default, it is empty.
CustomField.label: DF1071 Reportable
